content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Maria. I am flexible in my negotiations and would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask what your budget is for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 1000 Euros per month.

Are you open to discussing the rental price with me?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Yes, I am open to discussing the rental price with you. Can you provide me with more information about your budget, such as how long you plan to stay in the apartment and any additional needs you may have? This will help me better understand your expectations and what I can offer you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I plan to stay for 12 months and I don't have any additional needs.

What is the rental price you are proposing?

Is it negotiable?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for letting me know. Based on the size of the apartment and your length of stay, I am proposing a rental price of 1200 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating on this price. Is there a specific price range that you are looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine
